doc.title: David O. Selznick: 'Your New Producer'
doc.plot: Humorist 'Robert Benchley' (qv) is shown at what appears to be the head table at a dinner honoring producer 'David O. Selznick' (qv). However, Mr. Selznick has not yet appeared. While they wait for him to arrive, Benchley shows excerpts from (and provides commentary for) many of the films he produced at Paramount, RKO, and MGM.
